option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: cd ProductsABM; cd ./config-service; echo "~~~~~~~ Build config ~~~~~~~"; ./gradlew build; cd ../discovery-service/; echo "~~~~~~~ Build eureka ~~~~~~~"; ./gradlew build; cd ../gateway-service/; echo "~~~~~~~ Build gateway ~~~~~~~"; ./gradlew build; cd ../products-service/; echo "~~~~~~~ Build products ~~~~~~~"; ./gradlew build; cd ../stock-service/; echo "~~~~~~~ Build stock ~~~~~~~"; ./gradlew build; cd ../category-service/; echo "~~~~~~~ Build category ~~~~~~~"; ./gradlew build; cd ..
